title: Rav Shimon Hershler Passes
body: Rav Shimon Hershler zt”l, a prominent Vizhnitz chassidus rabbi in London, has passed away at 81 after a prolonged illness.

title: Bobover Rebbe Votes in NYC
body: The Bobover Rebbe personally voted in the NYC mayoral elections, inspiring a massive turnout in the Bobover kehillah. The news was delivered through a community-wide phone message from askan Reb Yoel Rosenfeld.

title: Rochel Imeinu's 3,579th Yahrtzeit
body: Tens of thousands of Yidden flock to Kever Rochel Imeinu in Beis Lechem to mark 3,579 years since Mammeh Rochel's passing, but the event turns into chaos and severe congestion.

title: Rav Dov Landau in Switzerland
body: Rav Dov Landau leads a delegation to Switzerland to strengthen Keren Olam HaTorah, a foundation that has distributed hundreds of millions of shekels. The mission follows a recent Atzeres in support of the Torah world.

title: Former Hostage's Powerful Speech
body: Former hostage Bar Kupershtein delivered a moving speech at Tel Aviv's Hostages Square, reciting Shema Yisroel and donning tefillin before a crowd of thousands.
